divs: Sighting DetailsAt 11:15pm I let the dog out and was star gazing on my back deck. Due north of my location a bright orange sphere which initialy seemed small caught my eye. It was pulsating and suddenly grew very very large. I ran back inside my house and grabbed my camera phone and NV. I video recorded the object which seemed to hover mostly then moved north and west. The object continued to pulsate. suddenly the object drastically shrank in size. The whole event lasted a couple of minutes. After playing the video back on the computer you can see at 27 seconds into the video a bright very very fast star like flash which apprears to be shot out from the sphere. I've spotted and recorded a few ufo's in the past and reported them here. I dont know what this object was it just seemed so large. Clearly larger that a full moon looks in the sky. I'm not sure at the distance from the object it seemed close but I could be certain. If I had to guess less than a mile.
